articles.title: Man sentenced to 10 years for threatening county prosecutor
articles.description: A man who threatened to kill a Missouri county prosecutor has been sentenced to 10 years in prison.
articles.content:
A man who threatened to kill a Missouri county prosecutor has been sentenced to 10 years in prison.
